name: Steve Jobs
title: The Resurrector of Apple
livesSummary: An American business magnate, industrial designer, investor, and media proprietor. He was the chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), and co-founder of Apple Inc.
reasonBehindTitle: After being ousted from Apple, he returned in 1997 to a nearly bankrupt company. His vision and leadership revived Apple, leading to the creation of the iMac, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, transforming it into one of the world's most valuable companies.
lessons: Passion, focus, and an unwavering commitment to simplicity and design can revolutionize industries and create products that people love.
youtubeTitle: Think Different: The Return of Steve Jobs

name: Hayao Miyazaki
title: The Reviver of Hand-Drawn Animation
livesSummary: A Japanese animated film director, producer, screenwriter, animator, author, and manga artist. A co-founder of Studio Ghibli, he has attained international acclaim as a masterful storyteller and as a maker of animated feature films.
reasonBehindTitle: In an era dominated by computer-generated imagery, Miyazaki continued to champion the art of hand-drawn animation, creating critically and commercially successful films that revived global appreciation for the craft.
lessons: Artistic integrity and a dedication to traditional craftsmanship can create timeless works that resonate deeply with audiences worldwide.
youtubeTitle: The Kingdom of Dreams and Madness: Miyazaki's Craft

name: Elon Musk
title: The Reviver of Commercial Spaceflight
livesSummary: A business magnate and investor. Musk is the founder, chairman, CEO and chief technology officer of SpaceX; angel investor, CEO, product architect and former chairman of Tesla, Inc.; owner, chairman and CTO of X Corp.; founder of the Boring Company; and co-founder of Neuralink and OpenAI.
reasonBehindTitle: With SpaceX, he drastically reduced the cost of space launches and revived the dream of human space exploration and colonization, making it a viable commercial enterprise for the first time.
lessons: First-principles thinking and an audacious, long-term vision can disrupt established industries and tackle humanity's greatest challenges.
youtubeTitle: To Mars and Beyond: Elon Musk's SpaceX
